description: Stockport County sign Aberdeen defender Jayden Richardson on a season-long loan deal.
title: Jayden Richardson: Stockport County sign Aberdeen defender on loan
title_page: Jayden Richardson: Stockport County sign Aberdeen defender on loan - BBC Sport
maintext:
Stockport have signed Aberdeen defender Jayden Richardson on a season-long loan deal.
The 22-year-old joined the Dons from Nottingham Forest last summer and made 19 league appearances in 2022-23.
"I'm absolutely delighted to get a deal sorted for Jayden to join us," boss Dave Challinor told the club website., external
"This one's been a long time in planning as he was someone who we discussed and tried to move on last season."
